value.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to low-ranked servants on an sea-faring ship. The crew [PAWN_pronoun] worked for was like a second family. \n[PAWN_nameDef] rarely saw plants or animals, and still finds them unnerving to touch.
[PAWN_nameDef] loaded ammunition and aimed artillery to pound [PAWN_possessive] army's enemies from afar.
Despite being in an infantry battalion, [PAWN_nameDef] rarely fought in battle. [PAWN_possessive] specialty was the rapid construction of defenses, traps and siege engines.
